summary: This bill addresses the issue of "Misbehaving Content Scrapers", directing them to comply with the "robots.txt" protocol and, if rate-limited, to utilize the GPO.gov Bulk Data Download service (accessible at https://www.gpo.gov/fdsys/bulkdata/) for data acquisition. The bill appears to be a technical specification pertaining to web scraping practices and data access, focusing on responsible web crawling and data retrieval from government resources.
